reviewText: I had the opportunity to see this concert live in Caracas. I've been in many concerts before, even saw Madonna once in Madrid, but Kylie X Tour 2008 was the best of the best. I recommend this DVD 'cause you are going to enjoy the performance of her best 28 songs. It's well filmed in London and She is better than ever!. Bravo Kylie, I love you!!!

Kylie Minogue is back, and better than ever. This show is even better than Homecoming or Showgirl, bringing a renewed and sexy Kylie. Great performances, great coreography, and the photography is beautiful.

Don't waste your time and buy it right now.
